Package com.example.matata

Class ProfilePicActivityTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.matata.ProfilePicActivityTest
public class ProfilePicActivityTest extends Object
Runs instrumentation tests for the ProfilePicActivity using AndroidJUnit4.

  • Field Summary

    Field
    Description

    db

      Firestore instance for storing or retrieving user profile image data.

    • testUserId

      private String testUserId
      ID used for identifying the test user in Firestore based on the device's unique Android ID.

    • activityScenarioRule

      public androidx.test.ext.junit.rules.ActivityScenarioRule<ProfilePicActivity> activityScenarioRule
      Rule that provides an ActivityScenario for ProfilePicActivity, enabling test control over its lifecycle.

  • Constructor Details

    • ProfilePicActivityTest

      public ProfilePicActivityTest()

  • Method Details

    • setUp

      public void setUp()
      Sets up necessary resources before each test, including Firestore and device ID for the test user. Initializes Espresso Intents for intent validation during tests.

    • tearDown

      public void tearDown()
      Releases resources after each test, such as Espresso Intents to ensure proper cleanup.

    • testOpenImagePicker

      public void testOpenImagePicker()
      Verifies that clicking on the profile picture launches an image picker intent. Expected outcome: Image picker intent with action and MIME type for selecting images.

    • testBackButton

      public void testBackButton()
      Tests the back button functionality by verifying that the activity finishes upon pressing the back button.

    • testDeleteProfilePicture

      public void testDeleteProfilePicture()
      Tests deleting the profile picture after an image is selected by resetting the profile picture to its default state. Expected outcome: Profile picture should be reset to the default icon.

    • testUploadButton_withNoImageSelected

      public void testUploadButton_withNoImageSelected()
      Tests clicking the upload button without selecting an image, expecting a toast message. Expected outcome: Toast message indicating "No image selected to upload".

    • testDeleteButton_withNoImageSelected

      public void testDeleteButton_withNoImageSelected()
      Tests clicking the delete button without an image selected, ensuring the profile picture resets to default. Expected outcome: Profile picture drawable should match the default icon, with no saved image URI.
